EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Trained in Trickery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Each core grants 5 Universal Spell Power and a +2% bonus to Doublestrike and Doubleshot, including this one.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Stolen Spell I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a stolen spell

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stolen Spell - Conjure Bolts
EnhancementSelection.Description: This is a stolen spell which acts like a Spell-Like Ability. The DC of these spells are equal to your Disable Device Skill.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stolen Spell - Cure Light Wounds
EnhancementSelection.Description: This is a stolen spell which acts like a Spell-Like Ability. The DC of these spells are equal to your Disable Device Skill.

EnhancementSelection.Description: This is a stolen spell which acts like a Spell-Like Ability. The DC of these spells are equal to your Disable Device Skill.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Master of Trickery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Magical Ambush force dice are upgraded to d6s. Spell Thief now steals 50% more spell points. You gain +2 to all stats and +2 Imbue Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Mage Hand: Eye Poke
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Target takes 1d2 Force damage per 2 character levels, scales with spell power. Max caster level 20. Target must make a Reflex save against your disable device skill +1d20, if they fail they become blind for 8 seconds with a recurring save every 2 seconds.
Passive: Gain 30 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Magic Fingers
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +[1/2/3] bonus to Open Locks, Disable Device and Concentration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Keep it Flexible
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain a [5/10/15]% reduction to arcane spell failure while wearing armor.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: My Favorite Bauble
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain 10 Universal Spell POwer when using a staff or an orb.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: I Prefer Subtlety
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Reduce threat from your missile and spell attacks by [10/20/30]%

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Mage Hand: Slap
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Target takes 1d4 Force damage per 2 character levels, scales with spell power. Max caster level 20. They must make a Fortitude save against your Disable Device Skill + 1d20 or become stunned for 6 seconds with recurring saves every 2 seconds.
Passive: Gain 30 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Protective Gear
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain a +[2/4/6] to Magical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating Cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster:Three Handed Casting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Quicken Spell Feat costs [1/2/4] Spell Points less. Stacks with Efficient Quicken from other trees.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Catcher Glove
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your mage hand will deflect incoming projectiles occasionally granting the deflect arrow feat.
Passive: You also gain a +2% bonus to dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Illusory Escape
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you tumble, you will phase out of reality briefly, passing through enemies as you do so.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Mage Hand: Meddle with Reality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Any creature you target with mage hand Slap or Eye Poke undergoes Meddled Reality. Creatures under this effect are no longer immune to sneak attacks, their Fortification is reduced by 25%, Will saves are reduced by 4 and the creature type changes to Fey for 30 seconds. This can apply to bosses.
Passive: Gain 30 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Improved Second Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an option.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mixed Magics
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your caster level with spells is now equal to your Character Level instead of individual class levels (max 20). This does not change the caster level of Rune Arms, Wands, Scrolls, or other Items.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Quick Silver
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain the Quick Draw feat and 5 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Tricks on Tricks
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your weapon attacks and offensive evocation spells have a chance of granting you a stack of Tricks on Tricks, which gives a +1 to Illusion and Enchantment DCs. This stacks up to 4 times. The stacks decay at a rate of 1 every 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Sweeping Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choice of how your Weapon Imbue will scale...

EnhancementSelection.Name: Trickster's Blade
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your weapon attacks do 1d4+1 Force damage. Scales with 200% melee power.

Stance.Name: Trickster's Blade
Stance.Description: Your weapon attacks do 1d4+1 Force damage. Scales with 200% melee power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Trickster's Bolt
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your weapon attacks do 1d4+1 Force damage. Scales with 200% ranged power.

Stance.Name: Trickster's Bolt
Stance.Description: Your weapon attacks do 1d4+1 Force damage. Scales with 200% ranged power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Trickster's Trick
EnhancementSelection.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your weapon attacks do 1d4+1 Force damage. Scales with spell power.

Stance.Name: Trickster's Trick
Stance.Description: Your weapon attacks do 1d4+1 Force damage. Scales with spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between +1 Dexterity, Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Mage Hand: Helping Hand
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Removed most crowd control effects from a target, heals them for 50% of their max Hit points and applies a restoration effect to the target. If your incapacitated for more than 6 seconds and have 5 spell points you will receive the helping hand effect. This cannot occur again until you are out of combat. Cooldown: 1 minute.
Passive: Gain 30 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Slippery Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Gain a +5% uncapped bonus to dodge and +1 Reflex saves whenever you land an offensive spell on a target. This can stack up to 3 times. 1 stack drops every 30 seconds.
Passive: +3% bonus to dodge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Pin Point
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Game +[1/2/3] Spell Penetration and [3/6/10]% Fortification Bypass. Rank 3: Your mage hand spells now automatically dispel Night Shield and Shield spell effect on the target.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Applied Force
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +1 imbue die per 3 rogue levels and +10% to critical damage with Force spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between +1 Dexterity, Intelligence or Charisma

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Presto
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Mage hand snaps it's fingers over a none boss target to make them disappear. We don't know where they go, it's magic! Target get a Will save to negate the effect with a DC equal to your disable device skill. PAssive: Gain 80 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Extra Hand
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
All meta magics are reduced in cost by 2.
An extra mage hand sometimes manifests when a monster strikes you with a spell and knocks them down.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Magic is a Tricky Business
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +[1/2] bonus to Illusion and Enchantment DCs. Rank 2: Passive - Tricks on Tricks now also increase to hit and damage with weapons by 1 per stack.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Good with my Hands
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Gain a +[3/6/10] bonus to Melee and Ranged Power.
Rank 3: Passive - Your Magic Resistance Rating Cap is increased by 8.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Trickster: Not Half Bad...
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose what your not half bad at...

EnhancementSelection.Name: Not that Bad with a Blade
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Competence bonus to critical threat range and damage multiplier with melee weapons and 15% Competence bonus to Max Hit Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Not that Bad with a Bow
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Competence bonus to critical threat range and damage multiplier with ranged weapons and 10% bonus to Dodge Bypass.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Not that Bad with a Spell
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain +20 Universal Spell Power, +2 Spell Penetration and +5% Critical chance with all spells.
